This top is awesome! It is lined, which is great because the outer layer is a little sheer. I love how there is smocking around the cuffs of the sleeves! 评论概述: Stylish and comfy georgette material blouse with lining
评论详情: This blouse is a keeper!  It is a dark blue with white spots (splotches).  it has a V-neck neckline and a small collar.  The sleeves are long and gathered at the wrist.  The blouse itself skims the body.  There is a dark blue lining inside, so I won't have to wear a camisole to cover my bra line.  This is the ideal travel blouse ladies.  It arrived in a tiny, plastic, vacuumed sealed bag.  I opened it and tried it on.  My husband was amazed that there was not a wrinkle or a hint of a wrinkle.  This blouse is going with me on my next trip. I can easily hand wash it and it will hang to dry in my shower area.  This blouse deserves another star!

I really like the Astylish Blouse. It fits true to size & it is a lightweight soft chiffon. The cuffs have elastic, which is perfect to push the sleeves up and have them stay in place. The blouse does have a lining, so no worries about it being see through. It feels very feminine, in fact, I cannot think of one negative thing to say, it's perfect!

There are so many things to like about this blouse - the color, the pattern, the style, the fit. The blouse is very comfortable and has a full lining except for the sleeves. I love the gathered elastic sleeves. The blouse falls very nicely. It is a flattering fit. The V-neck is just right. Will be a closet staple.
This blouse has quickly become a favorite in my wardrobe. It’s super flattering, and the polka dots give it a playful yet sophisticated vibe. Perfect for both work and casual outings!

I absolutely love it! The fabric is soft and comfortable, making it perfect for all-day wear. The polka dot pattern is fun and stylish, and the V-neck design adds a nice touch of elegance.
